title: Drawing, "Designs for fabrics to be printed with three colors", 1920–40
description: Torn asunder. Segment of a circle. Marbled ovoids on netted ground. Triangular, suggests a blue net.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for fabrics to be printed with three colors", 1920–40.
1920–40. Pencil, poster colors, tracing paper. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-91-b.
